channel.title: BM Steam Version not starting
channel.description:
Sooo I just bought the Steam Version of BM, and everything downloaded peachy, was going great, and then...when i started it, an error message popped up saying:
Game shader 'game_shader_dx9.dll' trying to override a base shader 'BMS_Flare'
And it won't start. I have removed the mod (thought maybe the mod was causing it the first time), and then I uninstalled and restarted my entire laptop (which updated Steam as well) and tried again. The same thing happened. Anyone gotta fix or an idea as to how or why this is happening? I'd like to play it xD

item.title: BM Steam Version not starting
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
Your computer is below the minimum specs required for this game. Integrated graphics chips are not properly supported for Black Mesa, because they do not generally support HDR. What is likely happening is the Steam installer is trying to auto install DirectX 9 and failing because your integrated graphics chip does not support it. See if you can get DX9 to install, if not through the automated Steam, from Microsoft’s drivers. This should resolve your issues, though again, playing below the minimum specs is asking for trouble.
